mapper.select: select A.BOARD_NO as boardNo, A.CATEGORY_NO as categoryNo, A.TITLE as title, A.USER_UID as userUid, B.DISPLAY_NAME as displayName, A.CONTENT as content, A.VIEW_CNT as ciewCnt, A.REG_DATE as regDate from board_tb A JOIN user_tb B ON A.USER_UID = B.USER_UID where BOARD_NO > 0 order by BOARD_NO desc
